content: कंदलः --लं {@--1@} A new shoot or sprout; <ls>U. 3. 40.</ls> {@--2@} Reproach, censure. {@--3@} The cheek, or the cheek and temple. {@--4@} A portent. {@--5@} Sweet sound. {@--6@} The plantain tree; कंदलदलोल्लासाः पयोबिंदवः <ls>Amaru. 48.</ls> {@--7@} Collection; <ls>U. 3. 11.</ls> --लः {@--1@} Gold. {@--2@} War, battle. {@--3@} (Hence) War of words, controversy. --लं A Kandala flower; विदलकंदलकंपनलालितः <ls>Śi. 6. 30</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 29.</ls>
